item.title: Emirates has struck marketing gold with its incredible video featuring football superstars
item.description:
Emirates Airlines has launched a global marketing campaign centered around soccer in anticipation of the World Cup in Brazil. An email sent to customers teases, “Watch the moment when two football legends meet in the Emirates A380 Onboard Lounge.” The campaign features a video of soccer stars Pel√© and Cristiano Ronaldo, who are Emirates’ new Global Ambassadors, interacting on an Emirates A380 plane. The airline encourages viewers to share the video on social media using the hashtag #AllTimeGreats...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/emirates-has-struck-marketing-gold-with-its-incredible-video-featuring-football-superstars/

item.title: Before you decide to check out Ronaldo, reconsider your decision
item.description:
A study by McAfee, a part of Intel Security, reveals that cybercriminals often use popular figures like Cristiano Ronaldo to lure unsuspecting users to malicious websites. These websites, designed to look like legitimate fan pages, can infect devices with malware capable of stealing personal information. McAfee’s “Red Card Club” list highlights the top eleven footballers whose names are most frequently used in these scams, with Ronaldo topping the list, followed by Lionel Messi and Iker Cassillas...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/before-you-decide-to-check-out-ronaldo-reconsider-your-decision/
